description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Run through hazardous levels, jump to avoid objects that would otherwise harm you, and shoot the many many enemies who want you dead for no real reason. Sidescrolling action with the left stick, 360 degree shooting with the right stick. Features medals and unlockable bonus levels (and yes it is possible to beat it without getting hit, good luck though).
